<span class=\"p_starter\">What is it? </: What is it? A method developed from extensive academic research that combines tactile physical interaction with digital apps to help children learn a language, by replicating the way they naturally acquire language from birth.
<span class=\"p_starter\">How does it wo: How does it work? We create interactive games and activities which children and parents play together. Children play learn their first sounds in a native accent, then words, then phrases. The first step is the Learning Cubes: read about them here.
<span class=\"p_starter\">Why early year: Why early years? 2 year olds are the world's best learners. Due to their brain plasticity, increased synaptic density, and other neurological factors, infants under the age of 6 absorb languages quickly and easily.

The Lingumi Method has been developed wi:
The Lingumi Method has been developed with early years experts and academics to empower parents and children to learn and practise a language together. By combining physical play with amazing digital apps, the method uses a mixture of physical actions, audio, video, and puzzle-solving to develop children's skills in a multi-sensory and playful environment.
The Lingumi Method has been created to stimulate neurological development through multi-sensory engagement.
<strong>Build basic vocabulary</strong>: Build basic vocabulary using the Lingumi Starter Kit and First Words app, which teaches over 60 new words, in a structure devised by academics at the University of Oxford that replicates the words a child learns first in their native language.
<strong>Expand your child's knowledge</s: Expand your child's knowledge of the new language, or practise their first language, with question games that build contextual language through guesswork and play.
<strong>Practise speaking</strong> the n: Practise speaking the new language you've learned together, using Lingumi Speak apps which adapt to what your child has learned, and guide you as parent through the process.
<strong>Activate and embed</strong> the: Activate and embed the language your child has learned with intelligent, personalised video and games. Learning through play, tailored to your child.
The Lingumi Method is built on research:
The Lingumi Method is built on research by the world's top academics in infant language acquisition, psycho- and neurolinguistics. In short, the research we use combines decades of study into how children learn languages, and how their brain works.
You can read more about the academic research into our method in our whitepaper, but here are the key principles:
<strong>Action-reaction: </strong>Childr: Action-reaction: Children learn best when they're rewarded with reactions to their actions. We've build this into our games, creating reactions in our apps to physical actions with our cubes.
<strong>Shared learning: </strong>When a: Shared learning: When a parent or carer takes part in the learning, repeating and helping the child to play and learn, the learning outcomes are improved. Our games are designed to be played in pairs or small groups.
<strong>Positive reinforcement: </strong: Positive reinforcement: Using the Lingumi method, children learn through experimentation and free-play, but are always encouraged positively towards learning and discovering.
